sentences.sContent: The singer complained of a sore throat after Wednesday’s show.
sentences.sCn: 星期三演出后，这位歌手说喉咙痛。

phrases.pCn: 内幕消息来源，内部检举人
链球菌性喉炎；脓毒性咽喉炎

remMethod.val: 食物通过(through)咽喉(throat)进入胃部

words.tran: 喉音的；嘶哑的；低沉洪亮的

trans.tranCn: 咽喉， 喉咙； 嗓音
trans.tranOther: the passage from the back of your mouth to the top of the tubes that go down to your lungs and stomach
